trends: There has been one other sighting in Vinton
There were no other sightings in Vinton on or around September 10th 2004
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a break from yardwork and went to set on a table in the shade. I sat down and laid back on the table and as I did I saw some motion in the sky. It was a perfect late summer sky clear and blue. I took a look at it and it was in the southeast at about one o'clock and it was motionless just a hint of reflection from the sun. The object was cylindrical but the ends had definition, it wasn't close enough to see windows. I thought I don't want to move but damn is this real. I sat up and watched it for a couple of seconds and it moved slightly the end I was looking at switched from left to right and it went back in a the northerly direction so quick I couldn't follow it.
